attacks.name: Bite
attacks.summary: Sink your teeth; heals on hit if the target bleeds.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.summary: Rake enemies with sharpened claws.

attacks.name: Chill Touch
attacks.summary: Necrotic touch that saps vitality.

attacks.name: Soulfire Bolt
attacks.summary: Necrotic flame that ignores disease resistance.

attacks.name: Siren Song
attacks.summary: A hypnotic aria that dazes foes.

attacks.name: Shriek
attacks.summary: A bone-splitting scream that damages creatures and objects.

attacks.name: Petrifying Gaze
attacks.summary: Lock eyes and turn them to stone if their will fails.

attacks.name: Venom Breath
attacks.summary: A spray of venomous mist that poisons foes.

attacks.name: Constrict
attacks.summary: Wrap around and crush with immense strength.

attacks.name: Dive Talons
attacks.summary: A swooping strike that hits hardest with momentum.

attacks.name: Twin-Tail Swipe
attacks.summary: A double strike with the tails; second hit weaker.

attacks.name: Foxfire
attacks.summary: A flickering ghost-flame that clings to the target.

attacks.name: Trident Thrust
attacks.summary: A powerful underwater thrust with a trident.

attacks.name: Shield Bash
attacks.summary: Strike with shield, knocking the target back.

attacks.name: Wispfade Strike
attacks.summary: A chilling strike advantaged in dim light.

attacks.name: Grave Dust
attacks.summary: A cloud of necrotic dust that weakens vitality.
